title: Make Temporary Tooth Fillings
brief: Fill tooth cavities temporarily using available materials to reduce pain and prevent infection.
steps: Step 1: Clean the cavity thoroughly by rinsing with water or picking out food particles.
Step 2: Choose filling material: candle wax, tobacco, aspirin, hot pepper, toothpaste/powder, or ginger root portions.
Step 3: Warm wax slightly if using candle wax to make it pliable.
Step 4: Pack the chosen material firmly into the clean cavity.
Step 5: Allow filling to set before eating or drinking.
Step 6: Replace filling as needed if it falls out.
warnings: This is temporary only - seek proper dental care when possible.
Ensure cavity is completely clean before filling to prevent trapping bacteria.
